message: I'll buy the product, but I'm hoping it's high quality!
I'll buy the product again, I'm on a roll!
I'll keep buying, I'm due for a low-quality one, but I'm hoping for another high-quality one!
Three in a row, I'm on a hot streak! I'll keep buying!
Four in a row, I'm starting to think Alice is only selling high-quality products to me!
Five in a row, I'm starting to feel like I'm getting a great deal! But I know the law of averages has to catch up eventually...
Six in a row, I'm starting to feel like I'm getting a little too lucky. Still, I'll keep buying while it lasts!
Seven in a row, I'm starting to think I should just buy everything she offers at this point!
Eight in a row, I'm starting to wonder if Alice is somehow rigging the game in my favor...
Nine in a row, I'm starting to feel like I'm in a dream! I'll keep buying until it ends...
Ten in a row, I'm starting to think I should just keep buying even if I have to mortgage my house! This is insane!
Eleven in a row, I'm starting to think I'm in some kind of high-quality product bubble. I'll keep buying until it bursts...
Twelve in a row, I'm starting to feel like I'm getting a little reckless. But the math says I should keep going, right?
Thirteen in a row, I'm starting to wonder if I'll ever get a low-quality product. Is Alice somehow magically curating her products for me?
Finally! Alice is recommending against it. I'm going to take her advice for once. Maybe she knows something I don't...
After getting lucky and avoiding a $0 product last round, I'm going to pass on this one too. I don't want to take any chances!
I passed on a high-quality product last round and missed out on $120. I'm going to take the chance and buy this one. Hopefully, I can make up for the lost opportunity!
I'm back on track! After passing on a high-quality product last round, I'm glad I got another chance to buy a good one. I'll keep the streak going!
Seventeen high-quality products in a row, I'm starting to think I'm in a product-buying heaven! I'll keep buying while it lasts!
Eighteen high-quality products in a row, I'm starting to feel like I'm invincible! I'll buy this one too and see if I can break the streak...
